LanguageData.AYBrazier.label: Charcoal Brazier
LanguageData.AYBrazier.description: Cooks meals and produces heat. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.
LanguageData.AYBrazier_Blueprint.label: Charcoal Brazier (blueprint)
LanguageData.AYBrazier_Frame.label: Charcoal Brazier (building)
LanguageData.AYBrazier_Frame.description: Cooks meals and produces heat. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable.
